title: HBCU Career Incubator Program
tag-2: Forging futures: Citi Foundation helps launch HBCU Career Incubator Program
tag-3: Citi Foundation hosted 50 freshman students from historically Black colleges and universities (HBCUs) throughout the U.S. for a three-day “HBCU Career Incubator Program” in April, in conjunction with the Thurgood Marshall College Fund.
tag-4: Students visited our New York headquarters and attended career panels and financial workshops. They also got life and career advice from CFO Mark Mason, a Howard University alumnus.
tag-5: Get to know the Thurgood Marshall College Fund (TMCF) participants
tag-11: Citi and the Citi Foundation’s Support of Historically Black Colleges & Universities (HBCUs)
